pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī rathikāyapi byūhepi siṅghāṭakepi purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhatipi sallapatipi nikaṇṇikampi jappeti dutiyikampi bhikkhuniṃ uyyojeti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:1.3: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:1.4: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā rathikāyapi byūhepi siṅghāṭakepi purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhissatipi sallapissatipi nikaṇṇikampi jappissati dutiyikampi bhikkhuniṃ uyyojessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:1.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī rathikāyapi byūhepi siṅghāṭakepi purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhatipi sallapatipi nikaṇṇikampi jappeti dutiyikampi bhikkhuniṃ uyyojetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:1.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī rathikāyapi byūhepi siṅghāṭakepi purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭhissatipi sallapissatipi nikaṇṇikampi jappissati dutiyikampi bhikkhuniṃ uyyojessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:1.11: “Yā pana bhikkhunī rathikāya vā byūhe vā siṅghāṭake vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā santiṭṭheyya vā sallapeyya vā nikaṇṇikaṃ vā jappeyya dutiyikaṃ vā bhikkhuniṃ uyyojeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:2.1.12: manussapuriso na yakkho na peto na tiracchānagato viññū paṭibalo santiṭṭhituṃ sallapituṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:2.1.20: purisassa hatthapāse ṭhitā sallapati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:2.1.24: anācāraṃ ācaritukāmā dutiyikampi bhikkhuniṃ uyyojeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:2.1.25: Dassanūpacāraṃ vā savanūpacāraṃ vā vijahantiyā āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:2.2.1: Hatthapāsaṃ vijahitvā santiṭṭhati vā sallapati vā āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc14:2.2.2: Yakkhena vā petena vā paṇḍakena vā tiracchānagatamanussaviggahena vā saddhiṃ santiṭṭhati vā sallapati vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
